ygData.subject: RE: Rune Question
ygData.msgSnippet: well, it has a duration, but it has a set number of HPs that it will absorb. more times than not, you ll hit the HP limit before you get to the duration limit.
ygData.messageBody:
well, it has a duration, but it has a set number of HPs that it will
absorb. more times than not, you'll hit the HP limit before you get to the
duration limit.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 04:12 PM 7/13/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...>
>
>Has a duration

>
>
>Does rune have a fixed duration, or will it last until the additional HPs
